title: University 1
sentences: The student status is established by enrollment.
leadási határideje a jövő hét vége.
The deadline for submitting the thesis is the end of next week.
Who will be your supervisor during the research?
Five credit points are assigned to this subject.
The exam period starts in mid-December.
She/he managed to win the state scholarship.
vezetője ma nem tartózkodik az egyetemen.
The head of the department is not at the university today.
során figyelembe veszik a középiskolai jegyeket is.
During the admission procedure, high school grades are also taken into account.
után kapják meg a hallgatók a diplomájukat.
After the final exam, students receive their diplomas.
The graduation ceremony will be in the ceremonial hall.
What is your grade point average in this semester?
Unfortunately, I didn't get a dormitory place.
The opportunity for second round admission is announced in August.
Attending the seminar is mandatory for students.
The lecture material can be downloaded from the university's website.
The comprehensive exam covers the material of three subjects.
After completing bachelor's training, one can apply for master's training.
Master's training usually lasts for two years.
megszerzése után már csak a záróvizsga van hátra.
After obtaining the pre-degree certificate, only the final exam remains.
There is high over-application for the medical faculty.
meghatározza, ki kerülhet be az egyetemre.
The point threshold determines who can get into the university.
Some students participate in tuition-free training.
The student union represents the interests of the students.
The Scientific Student Circle provides an opportunity for research work.
Besides teaching work, he/she is also involved in research.
dictionary:
hallgatói jogviszony - student status
szakdolgozat - thesis
konzulens - supervisor
kreditpont - credit point
vizsgaidőszak - exam period
ösztöndíj - scholarship
tanszék - department
felvételi eljárás - admission procedure
záróvizsga - final examination
diplomaosztó - graduation ceremony
tanulmányi átlag - grade point average
kollégiumi férőhely - dormitory place
pótfelevételi - second round admission
szeminárium - seminar
előadás - lecture
szigorlat - comprehensive examination
alapképzés - bachelor's training
mesterképzés - master's training
abszolutórium - pre-degree certificate / final certificate
túljelentkezés - over-application
ponthatár - point threshold
tandíjmentes - tuition-free
hallgatói önkormányzat - student union
Tudományos Diákkör - Scientific Student Circle (TDK)
oktatói munka - teaching work
